metadata.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

0.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
0.text: The Wavemother has righteously avenged our sister! We thank you for your hand in it.

1.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
1.text: We are all her children! We are all hers!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

2.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
2.text: You have helped us, but be mindful - Umberlee is always watching.
2.context: NodeContext: Kindly warning (or at least she thinks it is)

3.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
3.text: Would that everyone knew the Wavemother's favour!
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic
